meanings.definition: Physicists: People who study or practice physics.
meanings.sent1: Many physicists work in laboratories conducting experiments.
meanings.sent2: The physicists presented their research findings at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The group of physicists accidentally created a mini-explosion in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The collaboration between physicists and engineers led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent5: Physicists use complex equations to understand the behavior of matter and energy.

meanings.definition: Physicists: The plural form of physicist.
meanings.sent1: Two physicists were awarded the Nobel Prize for their contributions to quantum mechanics.
meanings.sent2: The physicists gathered for a group photo after the seminar.
meanings.sent3: The physicists' convention had a contest for the best physics-themed costume.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of excited physicists discussing their latest projects.
meanings.sent5: Physicists from around the world came together to share their research at the symposium.
